entry.content:
Python developer who automates tasks, builds apps and writes about coding. Send me your project \ event \ questions. Collaborative inquiries welcome.

Projects

divbull.com, an investing and stocks blog

positivipy, text generation flask + mysql app built with fuzzywuzzy, ftfy, language_tool_python, textblob and markovify libraries

Ask Tame Impala, web2py + MongoDB Tame Impala lyrics search app

mas tacos, proof of concept app with a US taco restaurant dataset
